TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FrameworkTextComposition extends System.Windows.Input.TextComposition

Docs.summary: Represents a composition during the text input events of a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition> when the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> by using an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)] and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> event occurs.
<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition> is the base class of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>. The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> class defines properties that return <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> objects to indicate the position of the text composition. When the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Complete() cil managed
Public ReadOnly Property CompositionLength As Integer
public: property int CompositionLength { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
Docs.value: The length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> property indicates how many characters have been entered since the last <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event. This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs. When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> property indicates the length of the composition.
<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CompositionOffset As Integer
public: property int CompositionOffset { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the position at which the composition text occurs in the .
Docs.value: The position at which the composition text occurs in the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs. When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> property indicates the position of the composition text.
<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionOffset%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ResultLength As Integer
public: property int ResultLength { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the event occurs.
Docs.value: The length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the event occurs.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> is –1.
<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ResultOffset As Integer
public: property int ResultOffset { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the offset of the finalized text when the event occurs.
Docs.value: The offset of the finalized text when the event occurs.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> is –1.
<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
